Dashboard.title: Dashboard
Dashboard.description: You are now signed in to your dashboard.

hero.title: Every Great Product
hero.description: Auth, i18n, database, and UI components — all production-ready. Stop configuring infrastructure. Start building what matters.

features.label: Built-in Features
features.title: Everything you need to ship faster
features.description: Every great product starts with a solid foundation. This starter gives you the essentials so you can focus on what makes your app unique.

auth.title: Authentication
auth.description: Pre-configured with Better Auth supporting email/password and Google OAuth. Session management, protected routes, and user profiles — ready out of the box.

i18n.title: Internationalization
i18n.description: Full i18n setup with next-intl. English and Spanish included as a starting point. Cookie-based locale switching with server-side rendering support.

database.title: Database & ORM
database.description: PostgreSQL with Prisma ORM, pre-configured with auth tables, migrations, and a singleton client pattern. Ready for your data models.

components.title: UI Components
components.description: Beautiful, accessible components from shadcn/ui with Radix primitives. Tailwind CSS v4, dark mode support, and a consistent design system baked in.

stack.title: Built on modern foundations
stack.description: Carefully selected technologies that work beautifully together. No compromises.

cta.title: Your launchpad is ready
cta.description: Clone it. Configure it. Ship it. The foundation is built — now go create something the world needs.
